comments:
Every time that I exit Eclipse 3.2 I receive one of two errors in a Visual C++ Debug Library Window.

Error 1 --------------------------------------------

Program: C:\Eclipse\Eclipse.exe
DAMAGE: after normal block (#25) at 0x00780440

If I then press Retry, I receive:

ECLIPSE caused an exception 03H in module ECLIPSE.EXE at 0167:00406f60.
Registers:
EAX=00000001 CS=0167 EIP=00406f60 EFLGS=00000246
EBX=00550000 SS=016f ESP=0065fca0 EBP=0065fcb0
ECX=8000cf00 DS=016f ESI=81abcbe4 FS=1a7f
EDX=8000cf08 ES=016f EDI=00000000 GS=0000
Bytes at CS:EIP:
33 c0 85 c0 75 bd 8b 4d fc 83 79 14 03 75 6c 8b 
Stack dump:
00000000 81abcbe4 00550000 00780420 0065fcc0 00406d4e 00780440 00000001 0065fdf8 00401165 00780440 00780350 00780e56 00000030 00000003 00780440

The identical error occurs if I use the j2re 1.4.2 version of Java.

Error 2 --------------------------------------------
After receiving Error 1 several times, I now receive a Debug Assertion Failed also in a Microsoft Visual C++ Debug Library window.

Program: C:\Eclipse\Eclipse.exe
File: dbgheap.c
Line: 1017
Expression: _BLOCK_TYPE_IS_VALID(pHead->nBlockUse)

If I then press Retry, I receive:

ECLIPSE caused an exception 03H in module ECLIPSE.EXE at 0167:00406e8b.
Registers:
EAX=00000001 CS=0167 EIP=00406e8b EFLGS=00000246
EBX=00550000 SS=016f ESP=0065fca0 EBP=0065fcb0
ECX=0042329c DS=016f ESI=81a8320c FS=7b1f
EDX=8000bd98 ES=016f EDI=00000000 GS=0000
Bytes at CS:EIP:
33 d2 85 d2 75 a7 a1 5c 2d 42 00 83 e0 04 85 c0 
Stack dump:
00000000 81a8320c 00550000 00780270 0065fcc0 00406d4e 00780290 00000001 0065fdf8 00401154 00780290 00780290 00780e64 00000030 00000004 00780410

----------------------------------------------------------------------

I checked for updates; none were available.
The Configuration Detail is reproduced below, after the Error Log.

----------------------------------------------------------------------
